title: The call boxes shall be so installed that they do not obstruct the exit-ways and yet their location can easily be noticed from either direction
clause_text: The call boxes shall be so installed that they do not obstruct the exit-ways and yet their location can easily be noticed from either direction. The base of the call box be at a height of 1 m. from the floor level.
section: Special buildings above 15 m. in height and Business and Industrial buildings above 32 m in height-
